title: You upload the inital content yourself
description: I’ll still handle all the coding — but instead of using real content, I’ll create placeholders where your content will go.

lightbulb.title: What I’ll need from you
lightbulb.text: A list of the types of content you want to include (e.g. text, images, videos), and how important or prominent each one should be.

check.title: What you'll get
check.text: I’ll create a layout document based on your input, which I’ll use to build the wireframe. You’ll also get a copy for reference.

title: I upload the initial content for you
description: I’ll take care of both the coding and uploading your real content — no placeholders needed.

lightbulb.title: What I’ll need from you
lightbulb.text: All the content you want included: text, images, videos, and anything else you'd like featured. You can send it in whatever format works best (Docs, Figma, folders, etc.).

check.title: What you'll get
check.text: I’ll organize and implement your content directly into the site, using it to guide the wireframe and layout from the start.
